label0: 1.07 MP CCD image sensor; Canon DIGIC DV II image processor
label1: Dual Flash Memory; record up to 20 hours of video to a 32 GB internal Flash drive as well as directly to removable SDHC memory cards
label2: Genuine Canon 48x Advanced Zoom gets you closer and wider, while preserving image quality
label3: Ultra-sleek, lightweight design allows you to take your camcorder with you anywhere
